軮軮軮

軮字的基本解释

軮
yǎng
〔軮轧（
y?）〕无边际的样子，如“忽軮軮而亡垠。”

軮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎng］
［《廣韻》烏朗切，上蕩，影。］
(1)见“軮軋”。
(2)地名。

軮字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　軮； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1241第26
【廣韻】烏朗切【集韻】倚朗切，?音盎。【廣韻】軮軋，聲也。　又【集韻】遠相映貌。　又房六切，音伏。縣名。【後漢·皇后紀】浚儀公主適軮侯。【註】軮縣，屬江夏郡。　【正字通】舊註軮軋與坱圠同，引揚雄《甘泉賦》忽軮軋而無垠。按《楚辭》坱兮圠兮，賈誼賦坱圠無垠。圠與軋通，坱俗作軮。揚賦本作坱軋，攺作軮，非。

軮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
軮字的起名意思

指无边际的样子，如軮轧。

Tang
Basic explanation of words
Tang
yǎng
〔軮宮(
y?)] A boundless appearance, such as "Suddenly dwarf and die."
Tang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎng］
["Guangyun" Wulangqi, the upper swing, the shadow. ]
(1) See "Fun rolling".
(2) Place name.
Tang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　軮; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1241 to 26
[Guangyun] Wulangche [Jiyun] Lean on Langche,? Yin Ang. [Guang Yun] Wan rolling, the sound is also.　[Jiyun] The appearance is far from each other.　There are six cuts in the room, and the sound is in the air. County name. [Later Han·Queens] Princess Junyi Shi Wanhou. [Note] Fu County, belongs to Jiangxia County.　【Zhengzitong】The old annotations are the same as the 坱圠, and Yang Xiong's "Ganquan Fu" is suddenly rolled and boundless. According to "The Songs of the Chu", Jia Yi's Fu is endless. Tie and rolling are connected, and the vulgar is used as a scorpion. Yang Fu was originally written as a dimple, 攺作绮, non-.
